entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 5:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: SE 64 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this evening then to rain showers overnight. Rain along the coast early this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
